features: Mount for Echo Show 15 - Hang the Echo Show 15 on a wall with our monitor brackets, you can simply screw it to the wall to free up the desk. Such a small tv monitor mount also fits well with 10”-32” lcd led screen, pc devices or other smart displays, and this universal tv mount compatible with most tv brands, like Sony, TCL, Samsung, Sharp, LG, Hisence, etc. Please check your stud location and TV VESA mount (Max: 100x100mm, Min: 75x75mm) before purchase.

Full Motion for Optimal Viewing Pleasure - Our show 15 wall mount bracket allows 360 degrees landscape to portrait rotation to offer more smooth and flexibility. You can customize your view angle from anywhere in the room with 180 degrees full motion swiveling from left to right. That 16.77” extension from the wall lets your screen always follow your sight, this full motion wall mount also can tilt 15 degrees for more confortable viewing, say goodbye to neck pain !

Robust & Solid Structure - We designed this wall monitor mount with triple articluating arm by SPCC cold rolled steel for double reinforcement and enhanced stability usage. This show 15 mount can hold up 33lbs after 4 times load-bearing test. Human-centric details in the cable management system helps avoid wires and cable mess. You can extend the bracket outward to make it easy to clean up the dust behind the monitor and remove the sundries.

Simple, yet Safety Secure - Features of super slim design that sits only 2” from the wall, this wall mount tv bracket creats a clean look for home decor, simplify the TV placement on the wall, perfect for small kitchen, entry hall, kids’ room, ect. The heavy-gauge line of tv mount features a sturdy design that ensures optimal support of your valuable TV at all times, gives you full safe and security while enjoy happy TV time.

Let it Mount with Your Show 15 Device - Use it as a full motion monitor show 15 mount to clear up desktop space for ergonomic computer screen installation to improve your posture and helps you get the best seat in the house. This single stud wall monitor mount comes with all the necessary hardwares and instructions for easy mounting in a breeze, any questions please do not hesitate to contact us at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This fits perfect for the Alexa Echo 15 perfect. I love having it on my wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works perfectly and easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: Customized design for echo show 15...very well balanced and designed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Basically Perfectly So Far!
reviews.reviewText: Got this mount as part of my wife's birthday present for her echo show for the kitchen and it's been a hit (obviously the show itself is the hit but she really likes how the mount compliments the show). Installation was easy (as long as you have a a drill and everything needed) and it feels super sturdy I pulled probably the equivalent of 30-40lbs on it and it felt like a rock! I like the flexibility of it, the extra cable guides on it and really for the price you couldn't beat it. Also I saw someone mention that you can't take the unit off the bracket, I don't know why they said that, you can easily unscrew it. Oh the one thing I'd recommend is when you're going to mount the bracket to the swing arm have someone help you it's just tricky to line it up and get it screwed on by yourself. Anyways a solid option that does a good job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect compliment to an Echo Show 15
reviews.reviewText: I got this specifically for my echo show 15 and it works like a charm. I can swivel it to a more convenient spot while I watch cooking videos to follow along recipes when I'm in the kitchen then put it back into place when I am done. It has a small footprint when pushed all the way back about 2 inches from the wall so you don't have to worry about it sticking out too much. It only tilts about 15 degrees up or down so just make sure you install it in a spot where you will be able to see it at eye level and you should be good to go. It rotates a full 360 degrees in case you need to look at something in portrait or landscape.8/10 I would recommend it. I hope this review is helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: Not much to say, other than it works as listed. I use it for my Echo Show 15. Sturdy, easy adjusted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Working well for a 14" portable monitor
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: Nuyoah Wall Mount for Echo Show 15, Adjustable Show 15 Wall Mounting Brackets for Alexa Accessories, Full Motion Wall Mount Rotate Swivel Tilt Extend for 10”-32” Monitors TVs, Holds up to 33lbsI got this for a small, 14" portable monitor that's hooked up to a mini PC. It's just used for web browsing and some occasional streaming.It's not super heavy duty, but it doesn't need to be. Doesn't stick out far from the wall when it's pushed in, which is what I wanted.Price seems quite reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good product
reviews.reviewText: This tv wall mount does not fit the VESA screw pattern for my 32" TV. I cannot use it. Furthermore, it is of a lower quality than expected. It is flimsy. I will be returning it.
